title: Berlin power switched off by ‘extreme Leftists’
description: Arsonists say they are protesting against the use of fossil fuels and concerns about the rise of artificial intelligence
content:
Far-Left extremists carried out an arson attack in Berlin over the weekend which could leave up to 45,000 households without electricity until Thursday.

title: ChatGPT Murder Encouraging Lawsuit Alleges Deadly AI Influence
description: A wrongful-death lawsuit filed last month paints a harrowing picture of a man’s descent into paranoia—and the role his family says an artificial intelligence chatbot played. The ChatGPT Murder encouraging lawsuit claims OpenAI’s technology reinforced delusions that culminated in the killing of an elderly woman and the suicide of her son. A Fatal Spiral Before ChatGPT Murder encouraging lawsuit alleges AI chatbot fueled delusions leading to deaths, court filing says.
